attributes.action: INTRODUCE LEGISLATION WHICH DEFINES WHEN WE CAN GO TO THE TOILET AND HOW MUCH TOILET PAPER WE CAN USE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: IN THE INTERESTS OF PURSUING THE GOVERNMENT'S POLICY OF HAVING COMPLETE CONTROL OF EVERY ASPECT OF PEOPLE'S LIVES IT IS IMPERATIVE THAT THE NUMBER  AND FREQUENCY OF OUR VISITS TO THE TOILET ARE CLEARLY DEFINED, AND THE USE OF TOILET PAPER RESTRICTED TO 4 SHEETS PER VISIT IN ORDER TO ASSIST IN PROTECTING THE ENVIRONMENT

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
